description.para: This parameter was added in Samba 3.0.23. This is an internal tuning parameter that sets the hash size of the tdb used for the open file databases. The presence of this parameter allows tuning of the system for very large (thousands of concurrent users) Samba setups. The default setting of this parameter should be sufficient for most normal environments. It is advised not to change this parameter unless advised to by a Samba Team member.
